sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_plant_mgmt_care_instructions"> <x_snc_plant_mgmt_care_instructions action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <diseases/> <fertilizing_schedule display_value="Weekends">a618d80e0a0a0b53150f5245edbeb5b6</fertilizing_schedule> <lightin0/> <lighting/> <number>CARE0001001</number> <pests/> <plant_id display_value="Tecomella">1d97f01cc3e5121017637205e4013161</plant_id> <pruning_guidelines> The best time to prune is early spring, just before new growth commences. Pruning at this time encourages vigorous flowering and maintains a manageable size</pruning_guidelines> <special_care_notes>This plant often require low water and are drought tolerant. The soil on which they are supposed to be planted must be Sandy, rich with calcium and well-drained. Keep the plants in a well drained soil with a drainage hole at the bottom. This will help to avoid over watering. Take care as to not leave stagnant water on top of the soil. Fertilise the plant once in 2-3 weeks during its blooming period.</special_care_notes> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-10-29 11:01:11</sys_created_on> <sys_id>38c209adc329161017637205e401316d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-10-29 11:01:11</sys_updated_on> <watering_schedule/> </x_snc_plant_mgmt_care_instructions> </record_update>
